lines.text: I got about an hour. We can spend it out here fighting, or we can spend it inside fucking. Personally, it doesn't matter to me. I like them both.

You know, the only thing I gotta say is, it's been really tough on men through the '70s and '80s when it comes to women. And I'll tell ya, if this is any indication of what the '90s is gonna be like, I, uh - to hell with it, I'll go gay!
All right, fella, this has gone far enough. Now, listen to me, nobody wants to hurt you any more. But you're sick, and you need some help.
SICK? Oh no, I'm way beyond sick! Hell, Jack, I'm even beyond reality!
